content:
While Cirque du Soleil is the most well-known circus company to perform at City Center, they are not the only one. Other circus companies that have performed at City Center include:

1. Big Apple Circus: A New York-based circus company that has been performing at City Center since the 1980s.

2. Les 7 Doigts de la Main: A Canadian circus company known for its unique blend of circus, dance, and theater.

3. Tim Burton's "The Nightmare Before Christmas" in Concert: Although not technically a circus, this concert production featured acrobats, aerialists, and other circus performers.

So, while Cirque du Soleil may be the most famous circus company to perform at City Center, they are certainly not the only one.
